```{r}
c("red", "orange", "yellow", 
  "green", "blue", "purple") %>% 
  fct_inorder() %>% 
  tibble(roygbv = .) %>% 
  mutate(rank = rep(1:2, 3)) ->
color_wheel_data

ggplot(data = color_wheel_data) +
  aes(x = roygbv) +
  aes(y = 1) +
  geom_col(width = 1,
           alpha = .7) +
  aes(fill = roygbv) +
  scale_fill_identity() +
  coord_polar() +
  aes(y = 1/rank) +
  theme_classic() +
  scale_y_sqrt() ->
g
```

# Printed color encoding

```{r}
# assumes integer input for CMYK - Bob Rudis, author of "Data, Driven Security: Analysis, Visualization and Dashboards"
cmyk <- function(C,M,Y,K) {

  C <- C / 100.0
  M <- M / 100.0
  Y <- Y / 100.0
  K <- K / 100.0

  n.c <- (C * (1-K) + K)
  n.m <- (M * (1-K) + K)  
  n.y <- (Y * (1-K) + K)

  r.col <- ceiling(255 * (1-n.c))
  g.col <- ceiling(255 * (1-n.m))
  b.col <- ceiling(255 * (1-n.y))

  return(col2rgb(sprintf("#%02s%02s%02s",
                     as.hexmode(r.col), 
                     as.hexmode(g.col), 
                     as.hexmode(b.col))))

}
```
